description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME:\\\nPlease disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 30 September at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. \\\n     \\\nService correctionnel Canada has the needs for the HEPA air units but more details for Annexes \\’a\\’ and \\’b\\’ has lately been constituted.see below for more details, of the contract and more under the contract.\\
duration_in_months: There are alot of informations but I take from first page, first job done last month. cutoff of Sept. 30th
